title: ZikirPlus
description: Modern, reklamsÄ±z seÃ§enekli ve kullanÄ±cÄ± dostu bir Zikirmatik uygulamasÄ±. Flutter ile geliÅŸtirildi, In-App Purchase ve Yerel Depolama Ã¶zelliklerine sahip.

body.raw:
A mobile application designed to help users track their dhikrs with a clean interface. Built with Flutter, it supports haptic feedback, local persistence, and a premium subscription model to remove ads.

- ðŸ“± Cross-platform (iOS & Android)
- ðŸ’° In-App Purchases (StoreKit & Billing Client)
- ðŸ’¾ Local Persistence (Shared Preferences)
- ðŸ”’ Privacy-focused (App Tracking Transparency)

## Install

For iOS: https://apps.apple.com/tr/app/zikirplus/id6758587319 - ZikirPlus
